title: 209: Oops, I Did It Again
itunes:title: Oops, I Did It Again
description: The true story of the most consequential pig in the history of Silicon Valley, or for that matter, the world. Followed by the true story of the most consequential pig in Mike’s career – the one he put on a pedestal fifteen years ago, that went on to become the unofficial mascot of Dirty Jobs. Then, a most unusual redux, as Tom Frank returns to set the record straight, and explain in no uncertain terms why a brown garbage bag is a poor substitute for a leather vest.
itunes:author: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
dc:creator: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
